content: the primrose blouse is a beautiful raglan style crochet top featuring the primrose crochet stitch throughout the body and sleeves this pattern is also available to view for free for blog subscribers on my website **what s include ** 8 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-5x photos for visual aid throughout the pattern links to video stitch tutorials and short row tutorial **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction of garment ** top down raglan yoke **yarn ** comfy worsted #4 - 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 50g/109yds **sizes ** bust finished circumference yardage x-small 28-30 32 840 yards small 32-34 36 933 yards medium 36-38 40 1010 yards large 40-42 44 1105 yards x-large 44-46 48 1184 yards 2x 48-50 52 1280 yards 3x 52-54 56 1373 yards 4x 56-58 60 1454 yards 5x 60-62 64 1544 yards use coupon code crochetlove at checkout to get 30% off your pattern purchase of $10 or more cannot be combined with any other sale or code all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **new to crocheting garments or need some extra help with them sign up for the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments email series ** 1 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www subscribepage com/crochetinggarmentsguide
